name: Mayhem Sonic
description:
A fan game inspired by Level up's Sonic maze mayhem! -  You as Sonic, takes on deadly mazes filled with Spikes, Loops, Robots and more!

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space bar to jump (hold to jump higher!) 
  • Down arrow key to duck
  • Hold Space bar while ducking to spin!

Classic controls eh!? 

Share your completion time in the comments below :} 

And also, if you liked this game and want more levels like this, please share it and comment your reviews below :]

Made with Godot Game Engine, 

All the assets taken from Spriter's Resources and Sounds Resourses and some made by me while other taken from different websites.
